div.class: custom_31258 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated zoomIn
div.p: Edited due to Governor Kelly’s executive order:

p.b: We will have your meals available for drive through pick up between 11:30-12:00 on Mondays and Wednesday. We will have a table set up in the Grade School Parking lot. Please pull through, pop your trunk, and we will put your meal in your trunk.

We will leave the school at 11:30. We will take the usual route when we bus, so you can judge accordingly as to the time to expect your meals. We will deliver the meals to your house and set the bag on your porch. We will do our part to honor the 6’ protocol.

p.span: USD 474 Haviland is closely monitoring the events and all of the information that is rapidly coming out in regards to the Coronavirus (COVID-19). When the time comes, decisions will be made that will be in the best interest of our students and staff. Please work with us as we try to manage this rapidly changing situation.

span.strong: Be sure to "Like USD #474" on Facebook to get update notices!!

div.span: USD 474 is an equal opportunity employer

br.span: The Kansas School Safety hotline (1-877-626-8203) is available for use by students, parents, and community members in anonymously reporting any impending school violence. Let’s keep Kansas kids safe!
